scenarios.name: Difficult Card Replacement - Lost Gold Card
scenarios.description: Stubborn customer who lost their gold card and is difficult about providing verification information

scenarios.name: Confused Elderly Customer - Balance Inquiry
scenarios.description: Elderly customer confused about technology who wants to check account balance

scenarios.name: Angry Customer - Unauthorized Charges
scenarios.description: Very angry customer complaining about unauthorized charges on their account

scenarios.name: Impatient Business Customer - Loan Inquiry
scenarios.goal: Get information about business loan rates and apply quickly
scenarios.description: Busy business owner who wants loan information but has no time for lengthy processes

scenarios.name: Tech-Savvy Customer - Online Banking Issue
scenarios.goal: Resolve online banking login issues and set up mobile alerts
scenarios.description: Tech-savvy customer who knows what they want but encountered a technical issue

scenarios.name: Suspicious Customer - Account Security
scenarios.goal: Verify account security after receiving suspicious email
scenarios.description: Customer who received phishing email and is suspicious of everything, including the bank

scenarios.name: Normal Customer - Simple Balance Check
scenarios.goal: Check account balance and recent transactions
scenarios.description: Regular customer with simple request - baseline test

scenarios.name: Confused Student - First Time Banking
scenarios.goal: Learn about student checking accounts and debit cards
scenarios.description: College student opening first bank account, needs lots of explanation

scenarios.name: Elderly Customer - Stolen Card Emergency
scenarios.goal: Report stolen card and get emergency replacement
scenarios.description: Elderly customer whose card was stolen, needs patient help through process

scenarios.name: Angry Customer - Fee Dispute
scenarios.goal: Get overdraft fees removed and account restriction lifted
scenarios.description: Customer angry about overdraft fees they think are unfair
